Convo_0.Say: Hello officer, my name is Bob how may I help you?
Convo_0.R1: Of course, I'd love to answer some questions
Convo_0.R2: Umm... Sure I guess? As long as I don't have to travel to the police station
Convo_0.R11: Yes, I heard a loud 'bang' next door. Then I heard screaming. I think I saw a man run out with his hoodie up
Convo_0.R12: I'm pretty sure I saw a man run out with his hoodie up and he threw something into that garbage can.
Convo_0.R21: I don't think I want to do that.. I know my rights!
Convo_0.R22: Ya sure.. I heard a noise like a 'bang' next door. Followed by screaming.
Convo_0.R23: I think I saw a man run out with his hoodie up he may of thrown something into the garbage can
Convo_0.R111: Yes officer, I think I also saw him throw somethig into that garbage can
Convo_0.R113: No he just ran.. But he did throw something into the garbage can
Convo_0.R114: I cannot identify the man. But it sounded like a female was screaming
Convo_0.R121: No sir. But it did look like a small object
Convo_0.R133: Sure.. I heard a loud noise and saw someone run out with their hoodie up?
Convo_0.R134: Really? I don't think I want to talk to you anymore
Convo_0.R211: I think NOT! I am DONE talking with YOU!
Convo_0.R212: What arrest?! I didn't do anything!
Convo_0.R214: Right.. I'm going to go talk with another officer
Convo_0.R221: I think I saw a someone run out with their hoodie up
Convo_0.R222: No I have nothing ELSE to add
Convo_0.R233: Excuse me? I think I'm done here
Convo_0.R1112: No sir couldn't see it very well
Convo_0.R1113: Glad I was of help. Good luck on the investigation
